languages.text: "Инцендии Чорда нечего вам предложить, моя же организация гарантирует свою благодарность. Уверен, между потерей влиятельного партнера и упрочением связей с ним вы выберете второе".

traits.locale_text: "Инцендии Чорда нечего вам предложить, моя же организация гарантирует свою благодарность. Уверен, между потерей влиятельного партнера и упрочением связей с ним вы выберете второе".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."
languages.original_text: "Инцендии Чорда нечего вам предложить, моя же организация гарантирует свою благодарность. Уверен, между потерей влиятельного партнера и упрочением связей с ним вы выберете второе".

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “因森蒂娅·库尔达没什么报酬能提供给您，但我的组织有充分的手段表达我们的感激之情。是失去一位有影响力的伙伴？还是加强与他们之间的联系？我相信您会选择后者。”
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: “因森蒂娅·库尔达没什么报酬能提供给您，但我的组织有充分的手段表达我们的感激之情。是失去一位有影响力的伙伴？还是加强与他们之间的联系？我相信您会选择后者。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「インセンディア・チョーダは何も提供しやない。だが私の組織の感謝であれば保証される。影響力のあるパートナーを失うか、絆を深めるか。きっと、後者を選んでくれることだろう」
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: 「インセンディア・チョーダは何も提供しやない。だが私の組織の感謝であれば保証される。影響力のあるパートナーを失うか、絆を深めるか。きっと、後者を選んでくれることだろう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Incendia Chorda no tiene nada que ofrecerle, mientras que la gratitud de mi organización está garantizada. Entre perder a un socio influyente o reforzar sus lazos con ellos, estoy seguro de que optará por lo segundo».
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: «Incendia Chorda no tiene nada que ofrecerle, mientras que la gratitud de mi organización está garantizada. Entre perder a un socio influyente o reforzar sus lazos con ellos, estoy seguro de que optará por lo segundo».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Incendia Chorda hat Euch nichts zu bieten, während der Dankbarkeit meiner Organisation garantiert ist. Wenn Ihr entscheiden müsst, ob Ihr einen einflussreichen Partner verliert oder Eure Verbindung zu ihm stärkt, dann wählt Ihr doch gewiss Letzteres."
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chorda hat Euch nichts zu bieten, während der Dankbarkeit meiner Organisation garantiert ist. Wenn Ihr entscheiden müsst, ob Ihr einen einflussreichen Partner verliert oder Eure Verbindung zu ihm stärkt, dann wählt Ihr doch gewiss Letzteres."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Incendia Chorda n'a rien à vous offrir alors que moi, je vous garantis la gratitude de mon organisation. Entre perdre un associé influent et renforcer vos liens avec lui, je suis certain que vous saurez faire le bon choix. »
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: « Incendia Chorda n'a rien à vous offrir alors que moi, je vous garantis la gratitude de mon organisation. Entre perdre un associé influent et renforcer vos liens avec lui, je suis certain que vous saurez faire le bon choix. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "İncendia Chorda'nın size sunabileceği hiçbir şey yok. Öte yandan mensubu olduğum örgütün minnetini sağlama almış olacaksınız. Nüfuz sahibi bir ortaktan olmaktansa bu ortakla bağlarınızı güçlendirmeyi yeğlersiniz, eminim."
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda has nothing to offer you, while my organisation's gratitude is guaranteed. Between losing an influential partner and strengthening your ties with them, I'm sure you'll opt for the latter."

traits.locale_text: "İncendia Chorda'nın size sunabileceği hiçbir şey yok. Öte yandan mensubu olduğum örgütün minnetini sağlama almış olacaksınız. Nüfuz sahibi bir ortaktan olmaktansa bu ortakla bağlarınızı güçlendirmeyi yeğlersiniz, eminim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
